item.title: 盎格鲁集团暂停澳大利亚炼钢煤矿的生产
item.description: 英国矿业公司英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）称，由于发生地下火灾，该公司位于澳大利亚昆士兰州的炼钢煤矿已暂停生产。【原文：UK mining company Anglo American Plc has suspended production at its steelmaking coal mine in Queensland, Australia, because of an underground fire, the company said.】

item.title: 美联储推迟降息不会阻挡全球宽松浪潮
item.description: 全球政策制定者不会因为美联储推迟降息而过分分散对自身宽松政策的关注。【原文：Global policymakers aren’t about to let the Federal Reserve’s delay in cutting interest rates distract them too much from their own easing efforts.】

item.title: 毛里塔尼亚总统加祖阿尼以 56% 的得票率有望避免第二轮选举
item.description: 根据这个西北非国家选举当局的初步结果，穆罕默德-乌尔德-加祖阿尼有望在周六的选举后连任毛里塔尼亚总统。【原文：Mohamed Ould Ghazouani was on track to secure a second term as president of Mauritania after Saturday’s election, based on preliminary results from the northwest African nation’s electoral authorities.】

item.title: 西班牙安托林公司再融资，为出售债券铺平道路
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙汽车零部件制造商安托林-伊劳萨集团（Grupo Antolin-Irausa）已同意为其超过 5 亿欧元（约合 5.36 亿美元）的银行债务进行再融资，从而为出售债券以置换 2026 年到期的票据铺平道路。【原文：Spanish auto-parts maker Grupo Antolin-Irausa has agreed to refinance more than €500 million ($536 million) of its bank debt, paving the way for a bond sale to replace its notes due in 2026, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币投资者开始思考 ETF 热潮冷却后的下一步行动
item.description: 随着第二季度接近尾声，加密货币投资者不禁要问，在比特币从交易所交易基金狂热时期创下的历史最高点回落之后，比特币的下一步该怎么走？【原文：As the second-quarter draws to a close, crypto investors are left wondering what’s next for Bitcoin after it retreated from the all-time highs registered during the height of the mania over exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 供应受限，悉尼房屋价值再创新高
item.description: 由于强劲的需求和低供应水平掩盖了高借贷成本带来的日益严重的痛苦，悉尼的房屋价值在 6 月份攀升至创纪录水平。【原文：Sydney home values climbed to a record in June as strong demand and low supply levels overshadowed increasing pain from high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 沙特阿美授予 250 亿美元天然气扩建合同
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）已授予价值 250 亿美元的建筑合同，用于开发其 Jafurah 天然气项目，因为该公司希望提高这种燃料的产量，而这种燃料被认为是减少植物变暖排放计划的关键部分。【原文：Saudi Aramco has awarded construction contracts worth $25 billion for the development of its Jafurah gas project, as it looks to boost production of the fuel considered a key part of plans to reduce plant-warming emissions.】

item.title: 今年 3210 亿美元的新兴市场债券狂潮即将喘息
item.description: 以硬通货计价的新兴市场债券销售在经历了六个月的火爆之后，在充满政治风险的下半年将急剧放缓。【原文：After a blockbuster six months, the sale of emerging-market bonds in hard currencies is set to slow down sharply in a second-half that’s littered with political risk.】

item.title: 法国大选第一轮投票率飙升
item.description: 法国选民正在参加本世纪最高级别的第一轮临时立法选举，极右翼的国民自卫军（National Rally）在投票中占据了主导地位。【原文：French voters are turning out at the highest level this century for the first round of a snap legislative election that has seen the far-right National Rally dominating the polls.】

item.title: 尼日利亚爆炸事件造成 18 人死亡，怀疑是女性自杀炸弹手所为
item.description: 周六，尼日利亚东北部发生一连串袭击事件，造成至少 18 人死亡，数十人受伤，女性自杀炸弹手被怀疑参与其中。【原文：Female suicide bombers are suspected in a string of attacks that left at least 18 people dead and dozens injured in northeastern Nigeria on Saturday.】

item.title: 国际清算银行告诉各国政府，警惕市场对债务的突然愤怒
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）警告说，尽管债券市场几乎不承认这种风险，但负债国很容易失去信心。【原文：Indebted countries are vulnerable to a precipitous loss of confidence even though that risk is barely acknowledged in bond markets, the Bank for International Settlements warned.】

item.title: 欧洲央行召开会议，法国大选阴影笼罩未来降息前景
item.description: 本周，参加欧洲中央银行在葡萄牙举行的年度务虚会的官员们将很难摆脱席卷欧元区第二大国家的政治大戏。【原文：Officials arriving at the European Central Bank’s annual retreat in Portugal this week will struggle to escape the political drama engulfing the euro zone’s second-biggest state.】

item.title: 印度 T20 板球世界杯的胜利可能会增加广告收入
item.description: 印度时隔 13 年再次赢得 T-20 板球世界杯，这很可能进一步增加这项已经吸引了数百万美元广告收入的运动的收入。【原文：India has won the T-20 Cricket World Cup after a gap of 13 years, a development that is likely to further boost revenue for the sport that already attracts millions of dollars in advertising.】

item.title: 如果斯塔默赢得权力，他将在钢铁中心地带面临巨大考验
item.description:
南威尔士将为即将就任的首相带来早期挑战，因为他正试图制定一项适合现代世界的工业政策。【原文：

South Wales is set to pose an early challenge for the would-be prime minister as he tries to forge an industrial policy fit for the modern world.

】

item.title: 中国工厂活动再次萎缩向经济发出警告
item.description: 6 月份，中国工厂活动连续第二个月萎缩，这表明中国政府寄希望于推动经济发展的一个领域出现疲软。【原文：China’s factory activity contracted for a second straight month in June, signaling weakness in an area Beijing is betting on to drive the economy.】

item.title: 新加坡因重建失去最后一个 18 洞公共高尔夫球场
item.description: 新加坡最后一个 18 洞公共高尔夫球场将于本周末关闭，俯瞰金融中心天际线的滨海湾球场将在政府的土地再开发运动中屈服。【原文：Singapore closes its last public 18-hole golf course this weekend, with the Marina Bay site overlooking the financial hub’s skyline succumbing to the government’s drive to redevelop land.】

item.title: 预计 2024 年下半年日本股市涨势将放缓
item.description: 投资者预计日本股市的上涨步伐将在下半年放缓，这增加了他们将更多资金转向竞争对手市场的风险。【原文：Investors expect the pace of Japan’s stock market rally to slow in the second half, increasing the risk they will shift more money to rival markets.】

item.title: 高速交易者和卖空者在亚洲面临日益严重的打击
item.description: 随着股市下滑，亚洲监管机构收紧了对冲基金流行交易的限制，一些人担心，这种稳定市场的尝试最终可能会扼杀关键策略。【原文：Regulators in Asia have tightened the screws on trades popular among hedge funds as stocks slumped, an attempt to stabilize markets that some worry may end up stifling key strategies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长称当地通胀率紧随美国和加拿大
item.description: 澳大利亚国库部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）周日表示，澳大利亚的通胀率仍然过高，但其通胀率正在跟随美国和加拿大等国走低。【原文：Australian inflation remains too high but its path lower is following countries like the US and Canada, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said Sunday.】

item.title: 美国就业与工资增长趋缓
item.description: 6 月份，美国雇主可能放缓了招聘步伐，同时工资增长也有所放缓，这对杰罗姆-鲍威尔和他的美联储同事们来说又是一个有利的发展，他们正在寻求更多关于通胀放缓的证据。【原文：US employers probably tempered their hiring while wage growth moderated in June, another favorable development for Jerome Powell and his Federal Reserve colleagues seeking more confirmation that inflation is slowing.】

item.title: CLO 钱太多，没东西可买了
item.description: 1.3 万亿美元的担保贷款义务市场即将成为其自身成功的牺牲品，因为管理者无法以足够快的速度创造出满足需求的债券，并且正在耗尽可购买的东西。【原文：The $1.3 trillion collateralized loan obligation market is about to become a victim of its own success because managers can’t create the bonds fast enough to meet demand and are running out of things to buy.】

item.title: 谁有可能赢得伊朗总统宝座？
item.description: 一名改革派和一名保守派将在 7 月 5 日举行的伊朗总统第二轮选举中对决，此前两人在 6 月 28 日的第一轮选举中均未赢得多数票。总统易卜拉欣-莱西（Ebrahim Raisi）在直升机坠毁事件中丧生后，伊朗举行了这次投票。虽然伊朗的最高权力掌握在最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊手中，但总统有时也可以通过民众支持、政治派别和与强大机构的联系来影响政策。此次投票正值【原文：A reformist and a conservative will face each other in a runoff election for Iran’s presidency July 5, after neither won a majority in a first round June 28. The vote was called following the death of President Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash. While ultimate power in Iran rests with the Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, the president can sometimes influence policy by drawing on a base of popular support, political affiliations and links to powerful institutions. The vote comes at a tim】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚将向旱灾严重的赞比亚出售 65 万吨玉米
item.description: 在厄尔尼诺现象给邻国赞比亚带来严重干旱之后，坦桑尼亚将向该国出售 65 万吨玉米。【原文：Tanzania will sell 650,000 tons of corn to Zambia after El Niño brought a severe dry spell in the neighboring country.】

item.title: 心灵鸡汤》申请破产保护
item.description: 心灵鸡汤娱乐公司（Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment Inc.【原文：Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment Inc. — the seller of self-help books, film and television content — filed for bankruptcy after failing to outrun a heavy debt load.】

item.title: 美航前首席执行官在欺诈案调查中被西班牙警方释放
item.description: 美亚集团（Americanas SA）前首席执行官米格尔-古铁雷斯（Miguel Gutierrez）因在巴西零售商数十亿美元的会计欺诈案中扮演了重要角色而被拘留，星期六在马德里被西班牙警方释放。【原文：Miguel Gutierrez, the former chief executive officer of Americanas SA, was released by Spanish police in Madrid on Saturday after being detained as part of an investigation over his role in the multi-billion dollar accounting fraud at the Brazilian retailer.】

item.title: 无聊 "的比特币使周末交易量降至历史最低点
item.description: 根据加密货币研究公司 Kaiko 的数据，今年周末交易比特币的比例已降至 16% 的历史最低点。【原文：The proportion of Bitcoin traded over weekends has declined to an all-time low of 16% this year, according to cryptocurrency research firm Kaiko.】

item.title: 肯尼亚食品价格上涨，通胀率接近四年低点
item.description: 由于食品价格上涨较为温和，肯尼亚的年度通货膨胀率在 6 月份降至近四年来的最低点，这为因生活成本高昂而日益感到沮丧的消费者提供了一些喘息的机会。【原文：Kenyan annual inflation eased to an almost four-year low in June as the rise in food prices was more benign, providing some respite to consumers who have become increasingly frustrated by the high cost of living.】

item.title: 国内供应充足，俄罗斯延长汽油出口许可
item.description: 由于国内市场供应充足，俄罗斯将允许本国炼油厂继续出口汽油一个月。【原文：Russia will allow the nation’s refineries to continue exporting gasoline for another month as the domestic market remains well supplied.】

item.title: 中国高尔夫球车涌入美国，呼吁征收 100%关税
item.description: 美国最大的两家高尔夫球车生产商正在请求缓解生存危机：中国进口产品的大量涌入。【原文：The two largest golf cart producers in the US are asking for relief from an existential hazard: a flood of Chinese imports.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将削减制药投入税以促进生产：有线电视
item.description: 据《电缆报》援引卫生部长穆罕默德-阿里-帕特（Muhammad Ali Pate）的话报道，尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）取消了对进口药品投入的征税，以促进本地生产。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu removed taxes from imported pharmaceutical inputs in a bid to boost local production, The Cable newspaper reported, citing Health Minister Muhammad Ali Pate.】
